shows.title: The Sweetchunks Band
shows.desc: The Sweetchunks Band are an eccentric musical comedy outfit, performing warped versions of songs that you know and maybe some you don’t, including one about bees, who really don’t have enough songs written about them. The band have supported the likes of the Wurzels, and their fun performance will leave you smiling, dancing and humming the tunes for hours afterwards.
